content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to retrieve a text summary of the best online apps and courses to learn a new language, but the text did not provide a clear list of resources. Instead, it offered reviews and recommendations for various language learning resources, including apps, courses, podcasts, and exchange programs, for a wide range of languages. My user then gave me a command to generate an image with prompts for language learning resources and travel destinations, which was successfully completed and saved to disk. The prompts included Duolingo, Rosetta Stone, Babbel, Pimsleur, and Memrise for language learning resources, and South Africa, Morocco, Egypt, Tanzania, and Kenya for travel destinations.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command generate_image returned: Saved to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/c6ea38d4-4722-4d50-8291-9883f6b5e3c6.jpg'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top language learning resources"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-best-language-learning-resources", "https://www.businessinsider.com/guides/learning/best-online-apps-courses-to-learn-new-language", "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "https://nymag.com/strategist/article/how-to-learn-languages-at-home.html", "https://www.lingualift.com/blog/best-language-learning-resources/", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/best-online-language-courses/", "https://www.mezzoguild.com/tools/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.theintrepidguide.com/top-language-learning-resources/", "question": "What are the top language learning resources?"}}}'}]
"""
